channel.title: Frank McGowan on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Frank McGowan on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Experiences of unpaid carers during Covid-19
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan AD - Alex Davis FM - Frank McGowan LC - Liz Carson MM On this episode of Iriss.fm I took time out to speak to unpaid carers to ask them how are they coping with the whole coronavirus. So first up we’re going to hear from Alex Davis. Alex is a full-time carer for her son, and her son’s name is Benjamin. So now we’re joined by Alex.
